Topic: Draw two habitats and the different living things in each
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two different habitats, one on land and one in water.
The student can include at least three different types of living things in each habitat.
The student can label each living thing in their drawing for clarity.
The student can show and label patterns that make each habitat unique, such as types of plants and animals.
The student can compare the living things in each habitat by showing and labeling similar or different plants and animals.
The student can organize the drawing so it clearly shows the diversity of plant and animal life in each habitat.
